issue.title: [Packaging][Wheel][OSX] Use crossbow's command to deploy artifacts from travis builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6963](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6963). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Travis starts to fail more often during artefact deployment to GitHub releases.
Crossbow has a builtin command to upload the artifacts which is more reliable.

All of the travis builds should use the crossbow script instead of relying on travis's deployment feature.
